strong: Responsibilities of Software Engineer at Expedia

li: Design, develop, document, and thoroughly test your code
li.1: Own multiple software components of the back-end
li.2: Build your own automation and reporting tools to provide capabilities around the components/applications you own and will participate in solving production issues
li.3: You will make the right judgment calls to deliver features in time, with the highest possible level of quality, in the best interest of the customer.
li.4: You will get to expand your skills in building distributed, resilient solutions while influencing others and raising the bar on the overall level of excellence within the team.

strong: Requirements for Software Engineer at Expedia

li: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree in Computer Science or Computing related discipline
li.1: 4+ years Software Development work experience using modern languages such as Java (preferred), C#, C++,.
li.2: 2+ years creating and supporting Web Services in a high transactional environment
li.3: Experience with in-stream processing technologies such as Kafka
li.5: Strong Object Oriented Programming concepts, data structure, algorithms, and system-level programming (including multi-threaded programming)
li.6: Good understanding of Software Development Lifecycle and methodologies
li.7: Knowledge of performance testing, application tuning, and load testing

li.4: Work from Home Internet Allowance/ Travel Allowance
li.5: Referral Bonus Bonus - $500 for every referral hired
li.6: Spot Bonuses & Birthday Celebration Gift Certificates
